item.description:
The weather is clearing in time for a First Sunday Hike and yet it's still cool enough for Buffett to enjoy a challenging spring hike.  We're getting in shape for the long Wishbone Trail next week, so will head out to do some distance.

As with last week's hike, Buffett has planned route that allows for those choosing a shorter distance to turn back at several spots while others can choose to push on.  Plan for a lunch break and bring the usual water, insect repellant, and proper attire.

Despite the last minute notice, it should be a great day and we hope to try some new routes on this Unfeatured Non-event.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: OMG It's May First Sunday!
